release.changelog:
Starting next week we will be ending support for SoundWave Classic
All new improvements features and other updates will now be released for SoundWave EQ which is available in the store
Thank you for your understanding
With the new update we've added Azerbaijani Kazakh and Uzbek languages
With the new update we have migrated the infrastructure for storing user settings to a different system
You will notice a significant performance improvement in saving and reading settings especially on low to mid-range devices compared to previous versions
However due to this change some of your user settings may not be transferred to the new system
With the new update we have optimized network operations in various parts of the app
With the new update we have improved overall app performance by offloading tasks that were previously executed on the main thread to separate threads
On devices running Android 12 and older we've made general adjustments to the background and button colors throughout the app
Additionally on Android 12 and above we've also updated the dynamic background and button colors with a focus on softer tones for the dark mode dynamic theme system on Android 12 and above
Most settings in the app now do not require a restart to take effect
Many user settings can now be applied instantly
The design of the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service consent form has been updated
The option to send optional diagnostic data is now located directly below the consent form (and can be changed later in the settings)
Various minor and major bugs throughout the app have been fixed
